category-edited.category-permission-warning: It lookz liek I dont haz teh permisionz to creete new channelz undr that category. Pls fix the situashun by grantin me the **Manage Channelz' permision** or I wont b able 2 add new tiketz at all.
category-edited.channel-privacy-warning: It lookz liek I cannot creete privee threedz in thiz channel. Make sure u haz **unlocked** them and I haz teh **requird permission**?? Otherwise I will creete tiketz az public threedz and anyone may b able 2 read them.
category-edited.default-category: Newle tiketz wil be creetd as new channelz undr teh categowee %{category}!
category-edited.default-channel: Newle tiketz wil be creetd az new threedz in teh channel %{channel}!

emote-edited: Teh emote 4 teh topik "%{topic}" haz bean edited!

edited.default: Oki doki, the default channel name format has been editd!
edited.topic: Oki doki, the channel name format 4 topic "%{topic}" has been edited!

format.too-long: Uh no, u cant use more than %{max} letterz

hint-edited.default: Teh deefault hint haz correctly been editd!
hint-edited.topic: Teh hint fr teh topik "%{topic}" haz correctlwy been edited!

missing-category-config: Oops, I couldnt creete ur ticket cause no'ne told me wheere to creete them. Please ask a servr moderator to use the %{set_category} cmd.

missing-perms-creation.channel: Ouch, I couldnt creete a new ticket channel. Pliz make sure I haz teh requiwed permissions in "%{category}" nd try again.
missing-perms-creation.thread: Woops, I couldnt creete a new ticket threed. Pleez make sure I haz teh requird permissionz in %{channel} and try harder.

missing-perms-setup.to-member: Oopsie, I couldnt setup ur ticket channel. Pls ask a server moderator 2 fix my perms, or any1 havin access to teh tickets thing may be able 2 read ur ticket and that might be uncool u know?
missing-perms-setup.to-staff: Woops, i couldnt setup teh channel perms for ur ticket. Plz check I have the 'Manage roles' perm in the category %{category}, or I wont prevent other bad guys from seeing teh tickets.

embed.desc-global: Herz a revie ov ur all configuration for dis server
embed.desc-topic: Herz a review ov ur config 4 teh topic "%{topic}" only

review.no-config: Dis server dont use teh cool ticket systm :sadcat:

role-edited.default: Yup okay, ur default role allowd to see tickets have been changd!
role-edited.default-reset: Yup okay, ur default role allowd to see tickets have been reset 2 'no one HAH'!
role-edited.topic: Roger that, role authorized 2 see tickets ov topic "%{topic}" have been changd!
role-edited.topic-reset: Roger that, role authorized 2 see tickets of topic "%{topic}" have been reset 2 default!

text-edited: Ye okay i'll use ur weird text, if u insist :coolcat:
ticket-created: I created u ur ticket in %{channel}. Btw "%{topic}" is a wzird reason imo

ticket-introduction.description:
Ok so!

%{user} wantd to create a ticket 'bout '%{ticket_name}' apparently. In da category **'%{topic_name}'**. Dont ask me y.
ticket-introduction.title: Mew ticket created!

title-modal.label: Ur theme
title-modal.placeholder: Type here whataver u want i won't mind
title-modal.title: Ur ticket or smth idk im not professionnal

too-quick: U are opening tickets wayyy 2 quick! Keep kalm, wait a few minuts and stop drinkin 2 much coffee mister

topic.cant-create: woopsie, I couldnt create dis topic (haha, got it?). Make sure u do not already have a topic with dis name, and disturb my support if needed (or not eh, wont blame u)
topic.created: Dat topic right here, uh, how did u namd it? "%{name}"! So uh, i hav successfully created it, no wowwies
topic.no-server-topic: Uh oh, u didnt create any topic 4 dis server yet!
topic.other-already-exists: A "other" topic is already proposed by default, no need to add another :proud:
topic.too-long: Uh-uh, no more than 100 chars for ur topic name kthx
topic.too-many: Oops uh, u reached teh max allowd topics limit! Blame discord 4 not allowing more than %{max} at the same time ig.
